name: To Kill A Dictator
description:
Have you ever wondered what would happen if you could change the past?

Well, in this game the butterfly effect and how the killing of one person can cause major problems down the line. Or maybe you won't kill anyone... who knows?

In order to use items click on them whenever you think they may be necessary.

Also I recommend downloading since itch stretches the game

Made for Untitled Game Jam 72
